name: rchain-toolkit
description: Node JS utils and methods to interact with rchain's rnode api and proto interfaces

scripts.compile: tsc --module commonjs src/index.ts --outDir dist -d && cp -r src/protobuf dist/ && cp src/rnode-protos* dist/
scripts.compile:tests: cp -r src/protobuf testsc/src/ && cp src/rnode-protos.js testsc/src/ && tsc tests/index.ts --outDir testsc
scripts.generate: pbjs --keep-case -t static-module -w commonjs -o ./src/rnode-protos.js ./src/protobuf/*.proto && pbts -o src/rnode-protos.d.ts src/rnode-protos.js

author: FABCO
